殰字的基本解释

殰
dú
胎儿死在腹中：“胎生者不殰，而卵生者不殈。”

殰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dú］
［《廣韻》徒谷切，入屋，定。］
胎儿死腹中。

殰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殰； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页584第02
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒谷切，音牘。【說文】胎敗也。謂未及生而胎敗也。【禮·樂記】胎生者不殰。【鄭註】內敗曰殰。　【集韻】通作贕。

殰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
殰字的起名意思

暂无。

Die
Basic explanation of words
Die
du
The fetus dies in the abdomen: "Those who give birth to viviparous do not die, but those who give birth to oviparous do not die."
Die
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dú］
["Guangyun" Tuguqie, enter the house, set. ]
The fetus is dead.
Die
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　殰; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 584 02
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Tuguqie, sound tablet. [Said the text] The fetus is also defeated. That is too late to give birth to a fetus failure. 【Rite·Le Kee】Those who give birth do not die. [Zheng's Note] Internal defeat is called death.　【Ji Yun】Tong Zuo 贕.
